tutorial.title: Present Value of a Lump Sum (Annual Compounding)
tutorial.scenario:
You are considering an investment opportunity that will pay $15,000 in ten years. If the competitive market interest rate is fixed at 6% per year, what is the investment worth today?

Play
tutorial.step: Press the RESET button to clear all the previous entries.
Enter the number of periods (in this case 10), and then press the N button.
Enter the periodic interest rate (in this case 6), and then press the I/Y button.
Enter the future cash flow (in this case 15000), and then press the FV button.
Press the CPT button and then the PV button to solve for the present value of the lump sum.
